text: Jean Assaad Haddad (17 December 1926 - 22 January 2021) was a Lebanese Melkite hierarch. He was an Archbishop of the Melkite Greek Catholic Archeparchy of Tyre in Lebanon from 1988 to 2005. He was born in Beit Chabab, Lebanon. Haddad died on 22 January 2021 in Beirut at the age of 94.Archbishop Jean Assaad Haddad â€  ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Lebanese Christians Category:Bishops
title: Jean Assaad Haddad
